entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning.
